Made possible by:🔥Murat Yilmas  🔥Rokgeezer  🔥Commandbaker3334  👽@FireboltJB 👽 YOUR NAME HERE WITH A SUPER THANKS)
🤔 Wondering how to join this list?

♥ Thank you to everyone above and to all channel members. All my free videos exist because of their amazing support.
comments.author: @DanielLoveOrg

comments.text: My reality checks transferred. Now that I fixed my sleep schedule I'm getting lucid during the last REM period. I was able to spawn things without having the dream collapse. It was amazing.
comments.author: @FireboltJB

comments.text: This makes sense! Additional it might be that the "chance per minute" is even less while dreaming since the brain becomes dumb. Thank you very much for this video!
comments.author: @jakobseiffert2110

comments.text:
Great video, Daniel 😀

During the week, I tend to do reality checks in response to natural cues — especially when I’m walking my pup and notice a beautiful sunrise or sunset. Any time the sky feels especially vivid, it’s my reminder to gently question reality.

On Fridays, I’ve been playfully doing light switch reality checks (with an extra flick while observing the light carefully), just for fun.

I’m going to try your micro reality test idea every 15 minutes — I’ll set a pleasant chime on Sundays and experiment with the additional micro reality tests!  Great idea!
comments.author: @LucidDreamingJourneys

comments.text:
Isnt the moment when I conciously leave my autopilot mode and go into default mode a micro-RC itself ?
 I feel like just thinking about the possibility that I could dream right now and watching my environment for 2-3 seconds could be enough to realize if I am dreaming.
Just it could lead into a „kind of“ - lucid dream, where I know I am dreaming but the plot of the dream maybe catch me back inside and I dont become fully lucid
comments.author: @MaxMustermann-e2p

comments.text: the creator we need, that dosnt spread fales infomation for views.
comments.author: @brett6626

comments.text: Ok, I get why you need to keep a dream journal. I found my first dream sign. A wolf. I never see wolfs in waking life. I thought to myself, this is odd. Why on earth am I dreaming of wolfs? if I never see them?! Cause your playing spot the difference! I freaking get it. Once you familiarize yourself with your dream signs you lucidity becomes easy. This is how I got lucid last night cause the wolf kept reoccurring.
comments.author: @FireboltJB

comments.text: Great video! Would you advise to do full realitychecks whenever thinking about them or only when something dream-like occurs in addition to the microtests every 15 minutes?
comments.author: @jlow1765

comments.text: What a video, this worked so well for me
comments.author: @abuzarfam5225

comments.text: I hope you read this message. I just want to say first of all, thank you very much for all your videos and that you help everyone, but there are too many videos on how to enter a lucid dream. If you could just make just one video on a training system or something like that that will actually make you enter a lucid dream without being too confusing, just make a simple guide on how to enter a lucid dream.
comments.author: @Nyxo.Editz0

comments.text: wait this was posted 9 minutes ago?
comments.author: @Freg1999

comments.text: Daniel, I like the idea of this video, but isn’t it harmful to force ourselves to be focused every 15 minutes? Don’t our brains need to rest throughout the day?
comments.author: @АлександърДиканаров

comments.text: I hope you read this message. I just want to say first of all, thank you very much for all your videos and that you help everyone, but there are too many videos on how to enter a lucid dream. comments.text:
Thank you Daniel, i love your videos!
For me it's bit hard to do reality checks during work time, beacuse i'm a taxi driver (and for the clients who seat inside my car could be a bit weird, if the driver pinch his/her nose😂) but sometime i check my clock on the screen and look back (of course when its safe) and sometimes i ask about myself where am i exactly, beacuse i dream a lot about driving and taxi driving and most time i drive in unfamilliar places in my dreams.
But i trying and you helped already a lot.
comments.author: @adamnogula8819
